description: Call Queues - Register a callback via API

average_wait_time_estimation.description: Options for the average_wait_time_estimation for a callback registered via API

enabled.description: If true, estimate the average wait time for the call before registering the callback

window.description: Window over which average wait time is calculated (in seconds)

cid_name.description: Caller ID name that the user should see when they receive the callback

cid_number.description: Caller ID number that the user should see when they receive the callback

priority.description: assign a priority to the caller

required_skills.description: Array of skills required for an agent to be able to ring for the call
